title: New: Shura – Just Once
content: Shura already released the best pop song of the year, (see Touch), and she’s back again with another stunner. Just Once, perhaps the best pre-break-up song of the year, well and truly puts her on the map as one of this years most exciting new stars. At this point it feels like her career could go two ways, either keep writing exquisite, cult-forming (seriously, look at people practically hyperventilating on Twitter) pop songs, or crossover to a far more mainstream perspective. Either way, more songs like this please.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
